attributes.action: firstly understand that we CAN believe it's not butter, and secondly to suggest that the company change the name; it annoys us awfully.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is all about second rate imitations of already existing entities. Products, ideas, principles. We propose to see how many people are interested in filtering out imitation in our society, with a view to replacing it with originality.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
